name: node-sale-fuse-l2.public.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Package used to participate in Node Sale for Fuse L2 networks, Flash (testnet) and / or Ember (mainnet), to run Avail light client with appropriate licence.
description: Welcome! As we prepare to launch zkEVM-powered Fuse Flash / Ember L2 in Q2 2025, we are offering 12,000 exclusive node licenses. If you are new to Avail & Node Sale, check [Avail light client](https://docs.availproject.org/docs/operate-a-node/run-a-light-client/Overview) and [Node Sale](https://www.fuse.io/node-sale) documentation for an easy overview.

exposable.name: Avail JSON RPC
exposable.description: JSON RPC endpoint for Avail node

author: Fuse Network <hello@fuse.io> (https://github.com/fuseio)
